snippet.title: Wasteland 3 - Fig Campaign Pitch
snippet.description:
ESRB RATING PENDING:  May contain content inappropriate for children. Visit esrb.org for rating information

Watch Brian Fargo travel the world in search of the ultimate team to make Wasteland 3.

Missed the campaign? Pledging is still open at CrowdOx! Support Wasteland 3 here: https://app.crowdox.com/projects/100109/wasteland-3

Wasteland 3 will be a party-based roleplaying game with an emphasis on deep reactivity, replayability, and strategic combat. It will be playable in single player and synchronous/asynchronous multiplayer, and released on Windows, Mac, Linux, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One. Wasteland 3 will feature deep turn-based combat with carefully-crafted encounters, evolving on Wasteland 2's strategic options. The game will also include an engaging dialog tree system to tell a branching story (written by the celebrated writers of Torment: Tides of Numenera), and set in the frozen lands of post-apocalyptic Colorado.

More information:

https://www.fig.co/campaigns/wasteland-3
http://wasteland.inxile-entertainment...
https://twitter.com/inxile_ent
https://www.facebook.com/Ranger.HQ/
